description: The Twitch API enables you to develop your own applications using the rich feature set that we provide

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Getting access tokens

blocks.name: getBlocklist
blocks.description: Get user's block list. Authenticated, required scope: user_blocks_read

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

blocks.name: addToBlockList
blocks.description: Add target to user's block list. Authenticated, required scope: user_blocks_edit

blocks.name: deleteFromBlockList
blocks.description: Delete target from user's block list. Authenticated, required scope: user_blocks_edit

blocks.name: getChannel
blocks.description: Get channel object

blocks.name: getUsersChannel
blocks.description: Returns a channel object of authenticated user. Authenticated, required scope: channel_read

blocks.name: getChannelVideos
blocks.description: Get channel's list of videos

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to video retrieve from

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 10. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: broadcasts
args.info: Returns only broadcasts when `true`. Otherwise only highlights are returned. Default is `false`

args.name: hls
args.info: Returns only HLS VoDs when `true`. Otherwise only non-HLS VoDs are returned. Default is `false`

blocks.name: getChannelFollowingUsers
blocks.description: Get channel's list of following users

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to follows retrieve for

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: (deprecated) Object offset for pagination. Default is 0. Maximum is 1600

args.name: cursor
args.info: Twitch uses cursoring to paginate long lists of followers. Check _cursor in response body and set cursor to this value to get the next page of results, or use _links.next to navigate to the next page of results

args.name: direction
args.info: Creation date sorting direction. Default is `desc`. Valid values are asc and `desc`

blocks.name: getChannelEditors
blocks.description: Get channel's list of editors. Authenticated, required scope: channel_read

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to retrieve editors for

blocks.name: updateChannel
blocks.description: Update channel object. Authenticated, required scope: channel_editor

args.name: game
args.info: Game category to be classified as

args.name: delay
args.info: Channel delay in seconds. Requires the channel owner's OAuth token

args.name: channelFeedEnabled
args.info: Whether the channel's feed is enabled. Requires the channel owner's OAuth token

blocks.name: resetChannelStreamKey
blocks.description: Reset channel's stream key. Authenticated, required scope: channel_stream

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to reset stream key for

blocks.name: startCommercialOnChannel
blocks.description: Start a commercial on channel. Authenticated, required scope: channel_commercial

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to start commercial for

args.name: length
args.info: Length of commercial break in seconds. Default value is 30. Valid values are 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, and 180. You can only trigger a commercial once every 8 minutes

blocks.name: getChannelTeams
blocks.description: Get list of teams channel belongs to

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to list teams for

blocks.name: getChannelFeedPosts
blocks.description: Get channel feed posts. Authenticated, optional scope: channel_feed_read

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to list posts from

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 10. Maximum is 100

args.name: cursor
args.info: Cursor value to begin next page

blocks.name: createPost
blocks.description: Create post. Authenticated, required scope: channel_feed_edit

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to create feed post for

args.name: share
args.info: When set to true, shares the post, with a link to the post URL, on the channel's Twitter if it's connected

blocks.name: getPost
blocks.description: Get channel feed posts. Authenticated, optional scope: channel_feed_read

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to retrieve post from

blocks.name: deletePost
blocks.description: Delete post. Authenticated, required scope: channel_feed_edit

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to delete post from

blocks.name: createReactionToPost
blocks.description: Create reaction to post. Authenticated, required scope: channel_feed_edit

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to create post reaction for

args.name: id
args.info: Required: Post id to add reaction for

args.name: emoteId
args.info: Required: Single emote id (ex: `25` => Kappa) or the string `endorse`

blocks.name: deleteReaction
blocks.description: Delete reaction. Authenticated, required scope: channel_feed_edit

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to delete post reaction for

args.name: id
args.info: Required: Post id to delete reaction for

args.name: emoteId
args.info: Required: Single emote id (ex: `25` => Kappa) or the string `endorse`

blocks.name: getChatLinks
blocks.description: Returns a links object to all other chat endpoints

blocks.name: getChannelChatBadges
blocks.description: Get chat badges for channel

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to list badges for

blocks.name: getAllEmoticon
blocks.description: Returns a list of all emoticon objects for Twitch

blocks.name: getEmoticons
blocks.description: Get list of emoticons

args.name: emotesets
args.info: Emotes from a comma separated list of emote sets

blocks.name: getUserFollowedChannels
blocks.description: Get a user's list of followed channels

args.name: user
args.info: Required: User to retrieve follows for

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: (deprecated) Object offset for pagination. Default is 0. Maximum is 1600

args.name: sortby
args.info: Sort key. Default is `created_at`. Valid values are `created_at`, `last_broadcast`, and `login`

args.name: direction
args.info: Creation date sorting direction. Default is `desc`. Valid values are `asc` and `desc`

blocks.name: checkFollowing
blocks.description: Get status of follow relationship between user and target channel

args.name: user
args.info: Required: User to check following on `target`

args.name: target
args.info: Required: Channel to check following for

blocks.name: followChannel
blocks.description: Follow a channel. Authenticated, required scope: user_follows_edit

args.name: target
args.info: Required: The name of the channel to be followed

args.name: notifications
args.info: Whether :user should receive email/push notifications (depending on their notification settings) when :target goes live. Default is false

blocks.name: unfollowChannel
blocks.description: Unfollow a channel. Authenticated, required scope: user_follows_edit

args.name: target
args.info: Required: The name of the channel to be unfollowed

blocks.name: getUserFollowingStreams
blocks.description: Get a list of streams user is following. Authenticated, required scope: user_read

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: streamType
args.info: Only shows streams from a certain type. Permitted values: `all`, `playlist`, `live`

blocks.name: getGamesByViewers
blocks.description: Returns a list of games objects sorted by number of current viewers on Twitch, most popular first

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 10. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

blocks.name: getIngests
blocks.description: Get list of ingests

blocks.name: getInformation
blocks.description: Get top level links object and authorization status

blocks.name: findChannels
blocks.description: Returns a list of channel objects matching the search query

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

blocks.name: findStreams
blocks.description: Returns a list of stream objects matching the search query

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: hls
args.info: If set to `true`, only returns streams using HLS. If set to `false`, only returns streams that are non-HLS

blocks.name: findGames
blocks.description: Returns a list of game objects matching the search query

args.name: type
args.info: Suggests a list of games similar to query, e.g. 'star' query might suggest 'StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty'

args.name: live
args.info: If true, only returns games that are live on at least one channel

blocks.name: getSingleStream
blocks.description: Returns a stream object if live

blocks.name: getStreams
blocks.description: List streams

args.name: channel
args.info: Streams from a comma separated list of channels

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: streamType
args.info: Only shows streams from a certain type. Permitted values: `all`, `playlist`, `live`

args.name: language
args.info: Only shows streams of a certain language. Permitted values are locale ID strings, e.g. `en`, `fi`, `es-mx`

blocks.name: getFeaturedStreams
blocks.description: Get a list of featured streams

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

blocks.name: getStreamsSummary
blocks.description: Get a summary of streams

args.name: game
args.info: Only show stats for the set game

blocks.name: getChannelSubscriptions
blocks.description: Get list of users subscribed to channel. Authenticated, required scope: channel_subscriptions

args.name: channel
args.info: Required: Channel to list subscriptions for

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: direction
args.info: Creation date sorting direction. Default is asc. Valid values are asc and desc

blocks.name: checkUserSubscribed
blocks.description: Check if channel has user subscribed. Authenticated, required scope: channel_check_subscription

blocks.name: getUserSubscribedChannels
blocks.description: Check if user subscribes to channel. Authenticated, required scope: user_subscriptions

blocks.name: getTeams
blocks.description: Get list of active team objects

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

blocks.name: getSingleTeam
blocks.description: Get team object

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Returns a user object

blocks.name: getSelf
blocks.description: Returns a authenticated user. Authenticated, required scope: user_read

blocks.name: getUserEmotes
blocks.description: Get list of user's emotes. Authenticated, required scope: user_subscriptions

blocks.name: getUserFollowingChannelsVideos
blocks.description: Get list of videos belonging to channels user is following. Authenticated, required scope: user_read

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 10. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: broadcastType
args.info: Only shows videos of a certain type. Supported values: `all`, `archive`, `highlight`. Default: `all`

blocks.name: getVideo
blocks.description: Get video object

blocks.name: getTopVideos
blocks.description: Get top videos by number of views

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 10. Maximum is 100

args.name: offset
args.info: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0

args.name: period
args.info: Returns only videos created in time period. Valid values are week, month, or all. Default is week
